host_templates._comment:
{FR: Modèle pour superviser les instances Azure Application Gateway v1 via l'API}
{EN: Template to check Azure Application Gateway v1 resources service using API}
host_templates.alias: Template to check Azure Network Application Gateway (version 1) service using API
host_templates.name: Cloud-Azure-Network-AppGateway-V1

information.author: Centreon

description.value:
**Plugin-Pack to monitor Azure Application Gateway service using RestAPI or AZCLI.**

Available Host template and related Services:

|Cloud-Azure-Network-AppGateway-custom|
|---|
|Backend-Status|
|Backend-Time|
|Clients-Traffic|
|Connections|
|Gateway-Time|
|Health|
|Requests|
|Throughput|
|Units|

This Plugin-Pack provides a Host discovery *provider* to be used with the Host discovery module.

**Plugin-Pack pour superviser les resources Azure Application Gateway via RestAPI ou AZCLI.**

Modèle d\'hôte disponibles et services associés:

|Cloud-Azure-Network-AppGateway-custom|
|---|
|Backend-Status|
|Backend-Time|
|Clients-Traffic|
|Connections|
|Gateway-Time|
|Health|
|Requests|
|Throughput|
|Units|

Ce Plugin-Pack fournit un *provider* Host Discovery pour le module d\'auto-découverte d\'Hôtes

information.monitoring_procedure:
# The documentation page of this Plugin-Pack requires a newer version of the Plugin Pack Manager module >= 19.10.1

# The related documentation is also available online on https://docs.centreon.com/, chapter 'Plugin Packs'
information.name: Azure Application Gateway
